channel.title: Posts on Life, the universe, and everything else
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Life, the universe, and everything else

item.title: MQTT with RabbitMQ
item.description: MQTT is a widely used protocol in the IoT world.Â There are different products to implement an MQTT server. From small standalone applications like mosquitto to large highly available services like HiveMQ, and of course the cloud vendors' IoT products like AWS IoT core and Azure IoT Hub. RabbitMQ is one of the most popular message brokers. It is easy to deploy and solves all kinds of messaging requirements at small and large scales.

item.title: AI Colonialism
item.description: From the MIT Technology Review: Artificial Intelligence is creating a new colonial world order. Big tech is following concerning patterns when deploying their services in developing countries. Just like the colonialists of the past, this companies are extracting value from vulnerable communities for their enrichment. This MIT Technology Review series of articles is a real eye-opener. “The AI industry does not seek to capture land as the conquistadors of the Caribbean and Latin America did, but the same desire for profit drives it to expand its reach.
